comments:
hi,

 I think this is happening because theres an assumption that the editor is backed by an IResource. I was going to check-in a fix that checks whether the resource returned below is null

 IResource resource = (IResource) epart.getEditorInput().getAdapter(IResource.class);

but I'm not sure if this action is intended to be active on external files at all?
